text: chaur anak( mou ham meat) pol tha tae avei del mean now leu mekh cheachraen chean ning phendei chea kammosetthi robsa anaknea? chaur anakachhlaey tha chea kammosetthi robsa a l laoh . trong ban kamnt kdei me tda krounea leu khluon robsa trong . trong brakadchea nung bramoulophdom puok anak towkean thngai barlok vinh daoy kmean kar sangsay champoh vea laey . puok del khat bng khluoneng noh kuchea puok del kmean chomnue
